description: Specialized in Software Engineering and Artificial Intelligence. Thesis on 'Scalable Machine Learning Models for Real-time Data Analysis' received a Distinction. Engaged in advanced modules covering distributed systems, machine learning, and software architecture.

Graduated with First Class Honours. Comprehensive curriculum covering core computer science principles including data structures, algorithms, software engineering, database systems, and web development. Final year project focused on developing a secure e-voting system.
Demonstrated expertise in designing and deploying scalable, highly available, and fault-tolerant systems on AWS. Covers core AWS services, security best practices, and architectural principles.
